name: Property Hive AllAgents Review Embed
author: PropertyHive

sections.description:
This plugin, from the creators of Property Hive, allows you to quickly and easily display ratings and reviews from AllAgents on your website by simply adding the shortcode [allagents] where you want them to appear.

Use pre-built widgets provided by AllAgents or we can integrate with their API whereby you can choose and customise the layout, including option to change colours and display the reviews as a list or in a carousel.

Note: This plugin is independent of Property Hive. You DO NOT need to be using Property Hive to download and use this plugin.
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of Property Hive, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Property Hive AllAgents” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our plugin you can view details about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading the plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

Updating

Updating should work like a charm; as always though, ensure you backup your site just in case.

The Shortcode

Simply add the shortcode [allagents id=”X”] where you want it to appear. Visit the setting area to get the full shortcode.

Disclaimer

This plugin is in no way associated with AllAgents and all output is achieved through use of their available widgets and API
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Corrected issue with header background colour setting not saving

1.0.1

  • Move third party assets to local plugin
  • Tweaks to setting sanitization

1.0.0

  • First working release of the plugin

short_description: Quickly and easily display ratings and reviews from AllAgents, plus customisation options
description:
This plugin, from the creators of Property Hive, allows you to quickly and easily display ratings and reviews from AllAgents on your website by simply adding the shortcode [allagents] where you want them to appear.

Use pre-built widgets provided by AllAgents or we can integrate with their API whereby you can choose and customise the layout, including option to change colours and display the reviews as a list or in a carousel.

Note: This plugin is independent of Property Hive. You DO NOT need to be using Property Hive to download and use this plugin.

screenshots.caption: Once you've added the [allagents] shortcode the AllAgents reviews and rating begin to appear
Settings allow you to choose if you want to use pre-built widgets provided by AllAgents
Alternatively we can integrate with their API whereby you can choose and customise the layout
Reviews output in a list or carousel
Create unlimited widgets, one per branch for example
